vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.31;
son of: Gilead (H1568H);
brother of: Abiezer (H0044I), Helek (H2507), Asriel (H0844), Shemida (H8061) and Hepher (H2660A)
Group of she.khem (שֶׁ֫כֶם "Shechem" H7928)
§ Shechemites = "shoulder"
descendants of Shechem
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Siquem; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示劍族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 "肩膀"
示劍的後裔(民 26:31)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
示剑族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 "肩膀"
示剑的后裔(民 26:31)
